Reviews.Title: Google Play Store doestn work
Reviews.Author: Melissa Shaw
Reviews.Content: This is a chinese cellphone. When I turned it on for the first time, the language was set up in chinese. When I finally was able to set up english, I tried to register into Google Play store to download apps.  However, it popped up a message error. It seems the phone do not have the google's digital certificate.

ProductInfo.Features:
GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 , 3G: HSDPA 2100
Android OS, v2.3.6 (Gingerbread), 4" TFT Multi-Touchscreen
Chipset: Qualcomm MSM7225A Snapdragon, CPU: 800 MHz Cortex-A5, GPU: Adreno 200
3.15MP (2048 x 1536 pixels) with Geo-tagging + Secondary VG A Camera and Video
512 MB RAM + microSD slot expandable up to 32 GB, Li-Ion 1735 mAh battery
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola MOTOSMART MIX XT550 Unlocked GSM Phone with Android 2.3 OS, 4" Multi-Touchscreen, Dolby Mobile & SRS Sound Enhancement, 3.2MP Camera, GPS, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth and microSD Slot - Black
